--BOOTSTRAP
$activity.definition_activity_01YHUOJ08BM5N6MwqURw0umQ7QhwiIAqJDb.output.jsonpath_queries.Bootstrap Configuration$
--BOOTSTRAP
Content-Type: text/cloud-boothook; charset="us-ascii"
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="config-$activity.definition_activity_01YHQMO29RYY81koJQLDlq7MygKSClEsBmE.input.source_array[@].uuid$"

#cloud-boothook
system
chassis-number    $activity.definition_activity_01YHQMO29RYY81koJQLDlq7MygKSClEsBmE.input.source_array[@].uuid$
system-ip              $activity.definition_activity_01YJI6DAUPOF85PYS6IEcHUcQit9fAnY79B.output.read_table_from_json[0].ip_address$
site-id               $activity.definition_activity_01YJI6DAUPOF85PYS6IEcHUcQit9fAnY79B.output.read_table_from_json[0].site_id$
organization-name     jpmc-branch-auto
vbond $activity.definition_activity_01YJIKKRLGVVK30PZaLw6m9hQ0XZuE4nj2g.output.read_table_from_json[0].ip_address$ port $activity.definition_activity_01YJIKKRLGVVK30PZaLw6m9hQ0XZuE4nj2g.output.read_table_from_json[0].port$
exit
!
!
interface GigabitEthernet1
no shutdown
arp timeout 1200
ip address dhcp client-id GigabitEthernet1
exit
!
interface Tunnel1
no shutdown
ip unnumbered GigabitEthernet1
tunnel source GigabitEthernet1
tunnel mode sdwan
exit
sdwan
interface GigabitEthernet1
tunnel-interface
encapsulation ipsec weight 1
color $activity.definition_activity_01YJI6DAUPOF85PYS6IEcHUcQit9fAnY79B.output.read_table_from_json[0].bootstrap_tunnel_interface_color$ restrict
!
username admin privilege 15 secret 9 $9$3V6L3V6L2VUI2k$ysPnXOdg8RLj9KgMdmfHdSHkdaMmiHzGaUpcqH6pfTo

--BOOTSTRAP--"
